name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich, decadent chocolate cake with a gooey center

steps.name: Prepare Ramekins
steps.description: Butter 4 ramekins and dust with powdered sugar, set aside

steps.name: Melt Chocolate
steps.description: Chop chocolate and melt together with butter in double boiler or microwave

steps.name: Beat Eggs
steps.description: Beat eggs and sugar together until thick and pale (about 3 minutes)

steps.name: Combine
steps.description: Fold melted chocolate into eggs, then gently fold in flour and vanilla

steps.name: Fill Ramekins
steps.description: Divide batter evenly among prepared ramekins

steps.name: Bake
steps.description: Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are firm but center is still soft

steps.name: Cool Briefly
steps.description: Remove from oven and let cool for 1 minute

steps.name: Unmold & Serve
steps.description: Run knife around edges, invert onto plates, dust with powdered sugar
